keyword: how many calories are in an olive garden breadstick
title: How Many Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in an olive garden breadstick, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in an Olive Garden Breadstick?
assumptions: Standard Olive Garden breadstick (~50 g), fresh-baked with garlic topping and butter, as served in the restaurant.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, portion size, and recipe changes. Check Olive Garden's official nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: One Olive Garden breadstick contains about 140 calories and 460 mg sodium.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant or packaged info.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an Olive Garden breadstick?
What's the sodium content in an Olive Garden breadstick?
faqs.a: About 460 mg of sodium per breadstick due to the garlic topping.

faqs.q: Are Olive Garden breadsticks high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, each has 25 g of carbs, mostly from flour.

faqs.q: How much protein in an Olive Garden breadstick?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 g of protein per breadstick.

faqs.q: Do Olive Garden breadsticks have cholesterol?
faqs.a: Typically 0 mg cholesterol, as they are dairy-light in the topping.
